history.proof: intros a l H. induction l as [| b n IH]. - simpl. left. reflexivity. - simpl. hauto q: on depth: 3.

ctx: induction l as [| b n IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a : A b : A * nat n : list (A * nat) H : forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) (b :: n) IH : (forall ca : nat, ~ In (a, ca) n) -> In (a, 1) (add_frequency_list a n) The term "b" has type "(A * nat)%type" while it is expected to have type "A".

ctx: induction l as [| b n IH].

original: intros a l H. induction l as [| b n IH]. - simpl. left. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a b) as [E | E]. + right. rewrite E.
